 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּג‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוּג‎</span>] **verb** ==fence about== (Aramaic word; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***sepsit, circumsepsit, clausit***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sepes***, compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סיג‎</span> Pa\`el ***fence about***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְיָיגָא‎</span> ***fence***; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוג‎</span> ***fence about***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***enclosure made with thorns***, etc., ***around grape-vines***, etc. [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1460</sup>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> II. ***make a*** <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; — only **Qal** ***Passive participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּטְנֵךְ עֲרֵמַת חִטִּים סוּגָה בַּשּׁוֺשַׁנִּים‎</span> [[Song.7.3|Song 7:3]] ***thy body a help of wheat fenced about with lilies*** (compare especially [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]). **Pilpel** ==intensive== ***Imperfect*** 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשַׂגְֿשֵׂ֑גִי‎</span> [[Isa.17.11|Isa 17:11]] ***thou dost fence it carefully about*** (&gt; ***make it grow***, as if <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוג‎</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂגה‎</span>, [[BDB#AE|AE]] [[BDB#Ki|Ki]] [[BDB#Brd|Brd]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]).
